location.text2: There are some lovely places to stay nearby. We recommend the B&O Parkhotel, where the celebration is also taking place.
location.text3: It's best to make reservations early so you can plan ahead and relax.

intro.text1: Dear friends and family, we are delighted to invite you to our wedding!
intro.text2: All important information about the celebration can be found below.
intro.text3: Please let us know if you're coming via the
intro.text6: The program will be updated throughout the year,
intro.text7: so check back a few weeks before the wedding. :)
intro.title: Welcome

rsvp.mailbody: Example:%0A%0AWe will attend and bring one child%0A%0AWe prefer vegetarian food%0A%0ASong 1:%0A%0ASong 2:
rsvp.text1: Please confirm by email whether you will be attending our wedding.
rsvp.text2: Please also indicate whether you will be coming with or without children.
rsvp.text3: Please also let us know if you would like vegetarian or vegan meals, or if you have any allergies or intolerances.
rsvp.text4: Please also send us two songs of your choice to get the dance floor rocking :-)
rsvp.title: Confirm participation
